sentence.Network_en: We protest this vile abjection of youth to age.

sentence.Network_en: I simply cannot put up with your abjection to his patronizing tone.

sentence.Network_en: How to face life? At the moment I am very abjection!
sentence.Network_cn: 如何面对人生? 此时此刻我好落魄!
